{{Description|"I will not forget my initial promise. Let this burning flame protect those I cherish, and may it never be extinguished."}}
'''Crimson Ooyoroi''' is [[Thoma]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Fiery Collapse triggers in the direction where the attack hits in a cone-shaped AoE, instead of the direction where the character is facing. It may be triggered by Normal Attacks that hit farther, but Fiery Collapse starts from the player's position thus may not reach the intended enemy.
